title: Who has been the greatest detective? - Quora

response.answer_text: I am going to go with a very unconventional choice. He is not even a detective per se. But He satisfies all the requirements listed in the question. My pick is Patrick Jane (The Mentalist). A CBI consultant. Witty, Funny has some amazing powers of observation and deduction (you'll have to watch The Mentalist for that). Has a certain air of mystique. Terrific sense of humor. Some of the most effective and the most entertaining methods to catch criminals. A sizzling on-screen chemistry with Teresa Lisbon. Carries himself so confidently and with lot of suave. This show might seem like an ordinary procedural at first, but I assure you it is much more than that. Do watch and give it a try. You won't be disappointed. :) Have been an ardent fan and admirer of the show and Patrick Jane :)Its as if Simon Baker was born to play Jane :)

Adrian Monk  Adrian Monk (Played to perfection by Tony Shalhoub) is the central character of the American Detective series Monk.  Just like Sherlock Holmes, he has acute powers of observation and highly relies on logic.Monk suffers from Obsessive Compulsive Disorder and this one affects his daily activities and adding the humor to the show. I'd say he is one of the best TV detectives ever created.
